Nightstrike:

"By the ma... By the pit" said Nighstrike while he avoided the 
missiles of Sideswipe anf ired 25 time his lasers in Aurora jet mode



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Torca/Ratchet/Sidseswipe/Orion/Hun-Grr:::
> 
> ::They hear Iron Raptor's transmission::
> Torca: I say we fight!
> ::Ratchet nods::
> Ratchet: Yeah! Give 'em somethin' to think about!
> ::My Maximals charge into battle::
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca switches his gun to charge launcher and fires a charge at 
Astroblast::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ratchet fires 8(semi-automatic) shots from each of his two guns 
at 
> Sinnertwin::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe fired 2 missles at Nightstrike::
> ~~~~~
> ::Orion looked to Hun-Grr::
> Orion: Ready for round two?
> Hun-Grr: This time, Hun-Grr destroy you!
> Orion: I don't think so.
> ::They fired at each other::
